entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
